content: {"locationId": "4996", "organizationId": "4202", "name": "Glenloch Baptist Church", "address1": "2807 Glenloch Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Franklin", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30217", "country": null, "phone": "770-854-5346", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.41255", "longitude": "-85.08679", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Heard County and Southern Carroll County", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "This food pantry is a ministry of Glenloch Baptist Church, located at 2807 Glenloch Road, Franklin, GA 30217.  The food pantry is located at the rear of the church sanctuary.  ", "notes": "This a drive through food pantry located at the rear of the Glenloch Baptist Church sanctuary. Turn onto Star Point Road and enter the paved parking lot beside the sanctuary and proceed to the rear of the building.  Someone will meet you at your car to obtain information and deliver the food. You will not need to exit your vehicle.  You must sign a document self-attesting that your household income is at or below 200% of the federal poverty level to qualify to receive foods provided by The Emergency Food Assistance Program (TEFAP).", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "770-854-5346", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Other, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 42, "regionName": "Atlanta Community Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "17b4255f-0222-445e-984f-653525137fd3.png", "website": "https://www.acfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
